song.eTitle: Mine Eyes Have Seen the Glory

verses.refrain: Glory! Glory! Halelujah! Glory! Glory! Halelujah! Glory! Glory! Halelujah! His truth is marching on.
verses.verse: In the beauty of the lilies Christ was born across the sea, With the glory in His bosom that transfigures you and me; As He died to make men holy, let us live to make men free! While God is marching on.
